message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I propose a 450k to 550k split. Let me know what you think!
Not bad, but I'd like a better deal. I'll wait for a better offer!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I propose an equal split of 500k each. Fair and balanced!
An equal split sounds nice, but I'm not ready to give up yet!
I'll give you a bit more, Bob. But I'm not getting any younger!
I propose a 550k to 450k split. It's a bit skewed but still fair.
Okay, Bob, I think I'll take this deal. It's not great, but it's better than nothing at this point!
